data.eml:eml: Australian species of Ommatius Wiedemann (Diptera: Asilidae) with an anepimeral bristle

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Daniels, Greg (2017): Australian species of Ommatius Wiedemann (Diptera: Asilidae) with an anepimeral bristle. Zootaxa 4231 (4): 535-563, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4231.4.3
